thread.title: Lorraine Kelly strips off for freezing cold swim in icy Antarctic waters live on air
thread.title_full: Lorraine Kelly strips off for freezing cold swim in icy Antarctic waters live on air

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Lorraine Kelly strips off for freezing cold swim in icy Antarctic waters live on air
text:
Lorraine Kelly strips off for freezing cold swim in icy Antarctic waters live on air The TV star took a dip in -29°C conditions during her 25th wedding anniversary trip Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Bikini-clad Lorraine takes a dip in the freezing antarctic Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Lorraine Kelly stunned her viewers as she stripped off for a freezing cold swim during her 25th wedding anniversary holiday. 
The TV star is taking a break from hosting duties on ITV's Lorraine, but she shocked stand-in presenter Christine Bleakely on Monday morning with a brave display after showing off her bikini body before taking a dip into -29°C Antarctic waters. 
The presenter is away with husband Steve Smith to celebrate their milestone, and she couldn't resist a swim in the icy conditions. Lorraine Kelly appeared on Monday morning's show (Photo: ITV) She went for an icy dip (Photo: ITV) 
She appeared on camera in a warm coat and furry hat, before announcing that it was time for a dip. 
"This is a first for me, this is Antarctica," she said. "And I'm going in." Lorraine stripped off for a very cold swim (Photo: ITV) 
With that, she took off her red jacket and revealed a very colourful bikini underneath before changing into the cold water. 
She didn't seem put off by the conditions, instead heard laughing as she splashed around while presumably her husband was filming. Christine called her cheeky (Photo: ITV) Very brave, Lorraine! (Photo: ITV) 
Lorraine kept her hat and gloves on - fair enough, really - and Christine was impressed with the brave stunt. 
She added: "Cheeky Lorraine, well done!" Like us on Facebook
